name: Name
home_welcome_text: SOS App gives refugees quick access to emergency services in Poland.
about_dialog_detailed: The goal of Ukraine Global Taskforce is to come together and work on various projects to altogether minimize the impact of the war and most importantly, equip/help/support our extended family of ukrainians.
send_help_text: If you are currently in danger and need help right now you can trigger an alert. Only do this if you need help right now.
about_text: SOS App connects you to local police at the touch of a button, perfect for use in emergencies.
about_first_small: Let us know who you are, so we know who to help
about_second_small: Let us know where you are staying, and who you are staying with, so we know where to find you.
about_third: When you’re in trouble, hit the Send Help button
about_third_small: When you hit the help button, we will contact the emergency services and let you know when they are on the way to your location.
howto_text_0: Syl’nishi’s **SOS-app** provides Ukrainian refugees with instant access to emergency services at the touch of a button
howto_text_1_1: **Tell us where we can contact you** and give us a little more context of the emergency situation you are in.
howto_text_1_2: (You can fill in your contact information now, and the app will remember it for later)
howto_text_2: **Press the red button** and allow us to see your location so we can alert the appropriate local emergency services to your location.
landing_title: Please tell us more about yourself and your emergency
landing_footer_msg: In the event of an emergency your GPS location will also be shared with local authorities.
alerted_title: Your request for help is pending...
alerted_title_success: Your request for help has been received
alerted_subtitle: Please keep this screen open, or cancel with the button below.
alerted_subtitle_success: The authorities will be automatically informed now and will send help to your location as soon as possible.
alerted_confirmed: You can close this browser now.
checkbox_text: I understand that pressing the red button on the next screen will alert the local police and/or other emergency services.
emergency_submit_alert: Send help to my GPS location
emergency_error_geolocation: Please allow the browser to use your location and try again
